name: TinyGravity
description:
Would you like to join to a skill-based challange?!
TINY GRAVITY is an addictive, one button stunning game. Use your best skill to reach
your best score. Be careful because your ship can be
destroyed easily by planets and asteroids among the sideline. 
Be on the Rewarded position at the end of the Tournaments!
Choose your favorite spaceship with different skills fit you the best.
//Visit MOBILE GAME REWARD//
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tinygravity
Instagram: http://instagram.com/tiny_gravity
Website: http://mobilegamereward.com
Free to Join!
Score register:
0-500: “I can get that without even touching the screen!“
500-2500: “My mum can get that score!“
2500-10.000: “This is not bad!“
10.000-50.000: “You still can be the best!“
50.000-150.000: “Get my recognition“
150.000- : “Woahhh“
User feedbacks:

“Really fun but so difficult“
“This game is very fun and time consuming. It was midnight and now 4 am. Great and
very cool app hope to see maybe more ships or even maps to fly in!“
“I have 20 games on my phone and I only play Tiny gravity“
“This is a great game to kill time“
“hard but when you get the hang of it, it becomes easier“
